name: 墨術 Magink
description:
Synopsis:

Ink art exists to seal the monsters who are causing chaos in the world. The Sima family has inherited this power from generation to generation, but it was destroyed by the uncle who coveted authority and monster power. The four ancient evils sealed by the ancestors were released, and darkness descended on the earth again. After Sima Yun's elder brother Sima Xiao was invaded by one of the beasts, he merged into one and went mad. He only had the consciousness to protect his sister, and fled with Sima Yun to the land. Distant cave. Sima Yun fell into a coma due to fright, and his brother knew that his consciousness could not last for long, so he left in order not to hurt his sister. The only successor, Sima Yun, embarks on a journey to seal the four murderers.

Game Features:

The protagonist can use skills with three attributes, namely fire, ice and thunder. Each attribute has two general skills and one big trick.

The relative symbol must be drawn on the screen to cast the ultimate, but after casting, the attribute is disabled for thirty seconds. Players can play by switching attributes according to personal preferences, or they can choose to cast powerful ultimate moves at the cost of not being able to use the attribute skills for 30 seconds.

※The content of this game involves "violence" - cute characters fighting or attacks that do not describe the details of character casualties, etc. There are no bloody pictures.

According to the game software classification management method, it is classified as "protection level".

※Pay attention to the usage time and avoid indulging in the game.
